description:
Chart AI is your personal financial charts expert for crypto and stock trading. Simply capture or upload a screenshot of any trading chart, and let Chart AI analyze it using advanced AI technology. Get concise advice on whether to buy or sell, tailored for spot or futures trading.  

**Key Features:**  
- **Easy to Use**: Choose an image from your camera or gallery with a single tap.  
- **AI-Powered Analysis**: Provides financial chart insights.  
- **Quick Results**: Receive actionable advice in seconds.  
- **Ad-Supported**: Free to use, with minimal Google ads.  

Take control of your trading decisions with Chart AI. Download now!

description:
Welcome to the EMI and Stock Calculator app! Whether you're planning to purchase your dream home or car or just curious about the financial implications of your investments, our app has got you covered. 

The Simple EMI Loan Calculator is a simple and easy-to-use money tool that can help you work out any type of loan. You can get an idea of your weekly payments, loan amount, interest rate, and loan term with just a few clicks.

Tired of confusing loan EMIs and struggling with loan EMI calculations?
This EMI Calculator and Loan Compare app is your one-stop solution for all your financial calculations!

Loan EMI Calculator: Easy calculations for home, car, bike, and personal loans. This EMI calculator app is an advanced financial tool that is useful for day-to-day life and has all its useful features. 

Calculate your EMI (equated monthly installment) for any loan amount, interest rate, and loan term in seconds. Just enter the details and get a clear breakdown of your monthly payments, including principal and interest components.

This EMI Calculator app is useful as a car loan calculator, a home loan calculator, a bank FD and RD calculator, or other financial calculations. The EMI Calculator app is a simple loan calculation tool that helps the user quickly calculate EMI and view payment schedules. Use this loan EMI calculator to calculate your EMI and plan your loan repayment in an effective way. You can also easily compare two loans by using the Loan EMI Calculator app.

Loan EMI Calculator is a simple, fastest, and light-weight application useful as a loan EMI calculator or mortgage calculator for all calculations. Our stock calculator helps you analyze potential returns. Invest smarter, not harder.

This Loan EMI Calculator app allows you to calculate the following values by inputting all the other values, like,
EMI Amount
Loan Amount
Interest Rate
Period (in months or years)

Features of the EMI Calculator and Loan Compare app:

• Calculate loan EMIs, interest rates, and repayment schedules.
• Customize your loan details to get accurate calculations.
• Save loan calculations for future reference.
• Easy-to-use and intuitive interface
• Compare loans and choose the best option for you.
• Calculate the GST and VAT components of any given amount.

NOTES:
• This app is working as a financial calculator app and not providing any lending services.
• This Loan EMI Calculator-FFinance Tool app is just a financial tool and not any loan provider or connection with any finance services or any NBFC.

Our EMI Calculator App is your trusted companion for all your financial needs, providing accurate calculations and valuable insights to help you make informed decisions.

Thank you.

description:
Orca Solana is your ultimate destination for staying informed and connected in the world of decentralized finance (DeFi). 🌊🐳 Designed with both beginners and experienced orca crypto exchange enthusiasts in mind, this app offers everything you need to stay ahead in the fast-paced world of blockchain and crypto.

📚 Explore DeFi Insights:
Orca is not just an app—it’s a comprehensive blog packed with informative content. From easy-to-understand guides on how DeFi works to in-depth articles on tokenomics and market trends, you’ll find everything you need to deepen your understanding of decentralized finance. 📝✨ Stay updated with expert insights and tips, whether you’re just starting out or a seasoned investor.

📈 Live Token Prices:
Track live token prices directly within the app! Orca exchange keeps you updated on the latest market movements in real time, ensuring you never miss an opportunity. 💹📊 Get an accurate view of token trends and make informed decisions with confidence.

🌟 Why Choose Orca?

    Easy-to-Use Interface: Navigate seamlessly through blogs, live prices, and updates.
    Up-to-Date Market Data: Stay informed with real-time data powered by Solana’s ultra-fast blockchain. ⚡
    Rich Learning Resources: Dive into topics like liquidity pools, staking, and crypto fundamentals.

Orca on Solana is more than just a tool—it’s your companion in mastering the decentralized economy. Whether you want to learn, track, or grow your crypto knowledge, Orca offers the perfect combination of insights and functionality. 🐳🌐

📥 Download now and take your first step into the future of finance! 🚀

description:
Plan your loans effortlessly with the Easyloan EMI Calculator! This tool instantly calculates your monthly payments, helping you stay in control of your finances. Simply enter the loan amount, interest rate, and tenure, and it will show you exactly what your monthly Installment will be.


1. EMI Calculator
EMI Calculator is a simple and easy-to-use app that helps you calculate your Equated Monthly Installment (EMI) for loans. Whether you are taking a home loan, personal loan, car loan, or any other loan, this app will help you calculate the EMI based on the loan amount, tenure, and interest rate.

Features:
• Calculate EMI for any type of loan (Home Loan, Car Loan, Personal Loan, etc.)
• Supports simple and advanced interest rate calculations
• Quick EMI estimation based on loan amount, tenure, and interest rate


2. GST Calculator
The GST Calculator app is designed to help individuals and businesses easily calculate Goods and Services Tax (GST) for various products and services. Whether you're a consumer looking to understand GST rates or a business owner calculating tax on sales and purchases, this app simplifies the process.


3. RD Calculator
RD Calculator (Recurring Deposit Calculator) helps you calculate the maturity value of your recurring deposits. This app makes it easy for investors to estimate the interest earned and the maturity amount based on monthly deposits, interest rate, and tenure.


4. FD Calculator
FD Calculator (Fixed Deposit Calculator) is a handy tool for calculating the maturity amount on your fixed deposits. This app helps you quickly determine the interest earned on your FD, based on the deposit amount, interest rate, and tenure, making it easy to plan your future finances.


5. VAT Calculator
Quickly figure out the Value Added Tax (VAT) on your purchases. Just enter the cost price and VAT rate, and this tool will give you the VAT amount and total price. Ideal for keeping track of your expenses while shopping!

Important Notes:
• This app is a financial calculator and does not provide any loan services or connect you with lenders.
• It’s meant to help you calculate EMI, loan interest, and other financial figures.

description:
EMI Calculator : 
EMI Calculator is a simple and easy-to-use app that helps you calculate your Equated Monthly Installment (EMI) for loans. Whether you are taking a home loan, personal loan, car loan, or any other loan, this app will help you calculate the EMI based on the loan amount, tenure, and interest rate.
Features:
•	Calculate EMI for any type of loan (Home Loan, Car Loan, Personal Loan, etc.)
•	Supports simple and advanced interest rate calculations
•	Quick EMI estimation based on loan amount, tenure, and interest rate

GST Calculator : 
The GST Calculator app is designed to help individuals and businesses easily calculate Goods and Services Tax (GST) for various products and services. Whether you're a consumer looking to understand GST rates or a business owner calculating tax on sales and purchases, this app simplifies the process.
Features:
•	Calculate GST on any product or service with ease
•	Easily calculate GST at different tax rates (5%, 12%, 18%, 28%, etc.)
•	Quick and accurate calculations with a user-friendly interface


SIP Calculator : 
The SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) Calculator helps you calculate the potential returns from your SIP investments. Whether you're planning to invest in mutual funds or other financial instruments via SIP, this app provides an easy-to-understand and precise estimation of your future investment value.
Features:
•	Calculate SIP returns for monthly investments
•	Supports flexible investment durations (monthly, quarterly)
•	View investment growth over time
•	Easy-to-use interface with inputs for SIP amount, tenure, and expected returns
How it works:
•	Enter your monthly SIP amount, tenure (in years), and expected return rate
•	Instantly see your expected corpus value at the end of the investment period
•	Track and plan your SIP investment growth with ease

FD Calculator : 
FD Calculator (Fixed Deposit Calculator) is a handy tool for calculating the maturity amount on your fixed deposits. This app helps you quickly determine the interest earned on your FD, based on the deposit amount, interest rate, and tenure, making it easy to plan your future finances.

RD Calculator : 
RD Calculator (Recurring Deposit Calculator) helps you calculate the maturity value of your recurring deposits. This app makes it easy for investors to estimate the interest earned and the maturity amount based on monthly deposits, interest rate, and tenure.
How it works:
•	Enter the monthly deposit amount, interest rate, and tenure
•	Calculate the maturity amount and total interest earned
•	Get a detailed breakdown of your investment growth over time

Important Notes:
• This app is a financial calculator and does not provide any loan services or connect you with lenders.
• It’s meant to help you calculate EMI, loan interest, and other financial figures.

description:
LoanCash - EMI Loan Calculator app is a comprehensive tool designed to simplify your loan calculations and facilitate efficient payment planning. 

Transform your financial planning with the LoanPro - EMI Loan Calculator. This intuitive and user-friendly app simplifies the calculation of monthly installments for various loans, such as car loans, home loans, and more. Empower yourself with quick estimates of your monthly payments, loan amounts, interest rates, and loan tenure, enabling informed financial decisions.

The LoanCash EMI Calculator app is a user-friendly tool designed to help you calculate and manage your Equated Monthly Installments (EMIs) with ease and to make loan calculation easy. The LoanCash EMI Loan Calculator app is an all-in-one financial tool for making informed decisions.

This app saves time and reduces the chances of human errors thereby balancing speed and accuracy in financial calculations.

★Please Note:
LoanCash - EMI Loan Calculator is a financial tool and not a loan provider or connected to any NBFC or finance services.
★This app is working as a Financial Calculator app and does not give any lending services.

Disclaimer NOTE:
- This application is designed solely for the purpose of providing users with estimations and calculations related only to loan information not provide any types of loan or financing services you can take advice from here and go through this app.
- All calculations provided by this app are for information only and NOT to be considered as financial advice. Investors are required to make their own assessment before investing.
- This app is not working with any loan provider and is not related to any Financing/Lending Company.

description:
BenevoLend is here to redefine how you access financial support, offering a seamless, transparent, and secure platform for your loan needs. Operated by BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED, BenevoLend connects you with certified financial services powered by our trusted Loan Provider, JAI BABA FINANCE COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED. 

Who We Are 
JAI BABA FINANCE COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED, our Loan Provider, is a fully certified Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) under Indian laws. Specializing in personal loan services, the Loan Provider has authorized BenevoLend to offer loan products on its behalf. We simplify the lending process, so you can access funds effortlessly, anytime you need them. 

Our Loan Offerings 
 Loan Amount: ₹1,000 to ₹1,00,000 
 Daily Interest Rate: 0.05% 
 Flexible Loan Tenure: 90 to 180 days 
 Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 18.25% 
 Service Fee: 0-5% (inclusive of 18% GST) 
 
1.Example Loan Calculation 
To help you better understand our transparent loan terms, here’s an example: 
 Loan Amount: ₹10,000 
 Loan Tenure: 90 days 
 Daily Interest Rate: 0.05% 

 2.Calculation: 
 Daily Interest: ₹10,000 × 0.05% × 90 days = ₹450 
 Service Fee (at 0%): ₹10,000 × 0% = ₹0 
 Amount Received: ₹10,000 - ₹0 = ₹10,000 
 Total Repayment Amount: ₹10,000 + ₹450 = ₹10,450 
 
 Note: Actual service fee percentages may vary based on your loan type. 
 
 Why Choose BenevoLend? 
 1. Fast Approvals 
 Say goodbye to lengthy loan processes. BenevoLend ensures instant loan approvals with funds disbursed directly to your account within minutes. 
 
 2. Affordable Interest Rates 
 Enjoy one of the most competitive daily interest rates in the market, starting at just 0.05% per day. 
 
 3. Flexible Loan Terms 
 Choose repayment plans that suit your financial needs. With loan tenures ranging from 90 to 180 days, you’re always in control. 

 4. Transparent Fee Structure 
 No hidden charges—what you see is what you get. Service fees are clearly outlined, ranging from 0-5%, and are inclusive of GST. 

 5. Secure and Reliable 
 Your privacy matters to us. BenevoLend uses advanced encryption and data protection protocols to keep your information safe. 
 
 How It Works 
 1.Sign Up: Register on the BenevoLend platform with your basic details. 
 2.Verify Your Identity: Complete a quick KYC verification process with your Aadhaar and PAN card. 
 3.Apply for a Loan: Choose the loan amount and tenure that fit your needs. 
 4.Get Approved Instantly: After verification, your loan is disbursed to your bank account. 
 5.Repay with Flexibility: Use the app to manage your repayments on time. 
 
Join thousands of happy customers who trust BenevoLend for their financial needs. With fast approvals, low interest rates, and a commitment to transparency, we are the go-to solution for quick and easy loans in India. 
 
BenevoLend – Loans Made Simple, Secure, and Affordable.

websiteContent:
# Welcome to     BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC)     PRIVATE LIMITED

![](https://www.bbposervices.com/img/banner-right.png)

Platform: BenevoLoan

Service Provider: **BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED**

Loan Provider/Lender: [JAI BABA FINANCE COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED](https://www.jaibabafinancecompany.com/)

BenevoLoan is a digital loan service platform operated by BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED, which acts as the service provider.


The Loan Provider, JAI BABA FINANCE COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED, is a Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) registered under Indian laws. The Loan Provider has appointed and authorized BenevoLoan to provide loan services through its platform.


## Partnership

BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED and JAI BABA FINANCE COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED operate in a collaborative partnership.

BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED acts as the Service Provider, managing the BenevoLoan platform, which facilitates loan services, including applications, approvals, and repayments.

JAI BABA FINANCE COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED, as a certified Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC), serves as the Loan Provider/Lender, offering the loans and managing the financial aspects of the lending process.

This partnership ensures a streamlined process where the Service Provider handles the digital platform's functionality, while the Loan Provider focuses on providing and regulating the financial services.

![](https://www.bbposervices.com/img/index/vision.png?_=1)

![](https://www.bbposervices.com/img/index/value.png?_=1)

© 2024 BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED All Rights Reserved.

description:
Enigma - Solana Wallet

Enigma is a simple, fast, and secure wallet designed for managing Solana (SOL) and other Solana-based tokens. Whether you're new to cryptocurrency or an experienced user, Enigma makes it easy to securely store and manage your digital assets.

Key Features:

Fast Transactions:
Send and receive Solana with near-instant speed and low fees, thanks to Solana's high-performance blockchain.

Secure & Private:
With Enigma, you control your private keys—your assets are never stored on a third-party server. No personal information is required, ensuring your privacy and security.

Minimalist Design:
Enigma’s clean, user-friendly interface ensures you can navigate the wallet easily without unnecessary clutter.

Token Support:
Manage, send, and receive Solana Tokens directly from the wallet. Swap tokens with low fees and fast transaction times.

Download Enigma Wallet today and experience the future of Solana, securely and effortlessly.

description:
Are you looking to expand your business and considering the costs of a loan?

Are you dreaming of owning a home and need a mortgage estimate?

Look no further! The simple EMIPay - EMI Loan Calculator app is here to calculate your EMI with ease.

Are you considering a personal project and curious about loan payments?

The EMIPay - EMI Loan Calculator app enables you to calculate all types of loans effortlessly. It saves time and minimizes the risk of human error, ensuring a perfect balance of speed and accuracy in financial calculations. Simply enter the loan amount, interest rate, and tenure to receive instant, detailed insights.


The EMIPay - EMI Loan Calculator app provides a range of financial calculators, including EMI calculators, loan calculators, bank calculators, stock calculators, GST or VAT calculators, and more.


Usages:
- EMI Calculator
- GST Calculator
- SIP Calculator
- FD Calculator
- RD Calculator
- Inflation Calculator
- PPF Calculator
- Gratuity Calculator


Key Features:
 The EMIPay - EMI Loan Calculator allows you to calculate the following:

1. Loan Calculator:
- This user-friendly loan payoff calculator is designed to help you estimate the costs associated with personal borrowing.
- Suitable for both personal and business loans, such as an auto loan payment calculator.
- Just enter the loan amount, interest rate, and term, and let the finance calculator app generate accurate repayment figures for you.
- Count the currency units.
- Easily calculate EMI and loan payments.
- AutoMobile loan calculator.

2. Loan Calculator:
- By entering your details, such as loan amount, down payment, interest rate, and term, users can calculate monthly payments and total interest costs.
- By entering details such as the loan amount, down payment, interest rate, and term, users can calculate both monthly payments and total interest costs.

Disclaimer:  
This application is intended solely to provide users with estimations and calculations related to loans. It does not offer any loan or financing services. You can use this app for guidance and advice, but please consult other sources for actual loan services.
- All calculations provided by this app are for informational purposes only and should not be considered financial advice. Investors should conduct their own assessment before making any investment decisions.
- This app is not affiliated with any loan provider and is not connected to any financing or lending company.

Group Support

Community

Flexible Terms

High Loan Amount

Flexible Repayment

# Website of Chatomaps

This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.

We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy has been created with the help of the [Privacy Policy Generator](https://www.blogger.com/).

Interpretation and Definitions

Interpretation

The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

Definitions

For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

- Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.

- Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.

- Application refers to LoanPRO - Loan EMI Calculator , the software program provided by the Company.

- Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to LoanPRO - Loan EMI Calculator .

- Country refers to: Gujarat, India

- Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.

- Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.

- Service refers to the Application.

- Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.

- Usage Data refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).

- You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.


Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

Types of Data Collected

Personal Data

While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

- Usage Data


Usage Data

Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.

Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

We may also collect information that Your browser sends whenever You visit our Service or when You access the Service by or through a mobile device.

Use of Your Personal Data

The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:

- To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service.

- To manage Your Account: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.

- For the performance of a contract: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.

- To contact You: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.

- To provide You with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information.

- To manage Your requests: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.

- For business transfers: We may use Your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Data held by Us about our Service users is among the assets transferred.

- For other purposes: We may use Your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Service, products, services, marketing and your experience.


We may share Your personal information in the following situations:

- With Service Providers: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact You.

- For business transfers: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.

- With Affiliates: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.

- With business partners: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.

- With other users: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside.

- With Your consent: We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.


Retention of Your Personal Data

The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.

The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of Our Service, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods.

Transfer of Your Personal Data

Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction.

Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer.

The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.

Delete Your Personal Data

You have the right to delete or request that We assist in deleting the Personal Data that We have collected about You.

Our Service may give You the ability to delete certain information about You from within the Service.

You may update, amend, or delete Your information at any time by signing in to Your Account, if you have one, and visiting the account settings section that allows you to manage Your personal information. You may also contact Us to request access to, correct, or delete any personal information that You have provided to Us.

Please note, however, that We may need to retain certain information when we have a legal obligation or lawful basis to do so.

Disclosure of Your Personal Data

Business Transactions

If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, Your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before Your Personal Data is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy.

Law enforcement

Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose Your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency).

Other legal requirements

The Company may disclose Your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:

- Comply with a legal obligation

- Protect and defend the rights or property of the Company

- Prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service

- Protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public

- Protect against legal liability


Security of Your Personal Data

The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Children's Privacy

Welcome to LoanDay - Auto Loan Calculator, your one-stop solution for all your financial calculation needs

With our user-friendly app, you can easily calculate Equated Monthly Installments (EMIs) for your loans, estimate your eligibility, and explore various loan options.

Key Features:

➤ Margin Calculator: Calculate profit margins for businesses. Supports gross and net margin calculations.
➤ GST Calculator: Compute Goods and Services Tax for products and services. Quick reverse GST calculation.
➤ VAT Calculator: Calculate Value Added Tax accurately. Supports VAT addition and removal for pricing.

description:
Welcome to ScorePro, we are committed to helping users assess credit scores, while providing financial information to help users improve their financial knowledge.

Main features:
1. Real-time credit score: Easily check your credit score anytime, anywhere, and keep abreast of your credit status. Receive personalized credit reports.

2. Credit improvement plan: Provide detailed score analysis and recommended improvement measures for your credit score report. Help you understand how to improve your score, effectively manage debt and make smarter financial decisions.

3 Financial knowledge sharing: Access a wide range of financial education resource libraries to learn how to effectively manage personal finances, improve credit scores, and understand a variety of financial products and services.

4 Data security protection: Use advanced encryption technology. Ensure the security of your personal information, so that you have no worries.

Please note: ScorePro is an independent credit score assessment tool designed to provide users with credit supervision and scoring services. We are not part of a bank or lending institution. Therefore, we are not involved in any disputes that may arise between users and any financial institutions. We recommend that users consult a professional before making any financial decisions.

Working hours: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM.
Email: cs@chercherestaurant.com
Address: 69 Moo 9 SATTAHIP, CHON BURI, 20180 Thailand

description:
Are you still worried about not having a spare fund? Fashion Rupee will solve this problem for you, and we will always provide you with efficient and personalized loan solutions, striving for excellence, integrity, and customer satisfaction.

Fashion Rupee's partner NBFC is Jayachelve Financing And Leasing Private Limited, which is registered and regulated by the Reserve Bank of India.

Fashion Rupee provides intermediary services to help NBFCs connect with users, and does not provide loans directly to users. The purpose of this is to provide you with safe and compliant services.

Characteristics of loans
Loan amount range: ₹ 5,000 to ₹ 100,000
Maximum annual interest rate (APR): 22%
Handling fee: up to 1% of the loan amount, plus 18% GST
Repayment period: 100 to 730 days

How is the loan calculated

About Fashion Rupee

Fashion Rupee's partner NBFC is Jayachelve Financing And Leasing Private Limited, which is registered and regulated by the Reserve Bank of India.

Fashion Rupee provides intermediary services to help NBFCs connect with users, and does not provide loans directly to users. The purpose of this is to provide you with safe and compliant services.

Frequently Asked Questions

#### Advantages of Choosing Fashion Rupee

1\. 100% online application process

2\. Competitive loan amount and interest rate in the market

3\. Transparent and secure processes

#### Who can apply?

We provide services to a wide range of clients and meet the following eligibility criteria:

Indian nationals

Age range: 20 to 55 years old

Stable employment: Applicants must have a stable income to qualify for loans

#### Steps for Loan Application

Download the Fashion Rupee application

Register using your mobile number

Input and submit the required information

Experience a rapid review process

Following approval, receive direct fund transfers to your account

#### Loan Services Provided

Characteristics of loans

Loan amount range: ₹ 5,000 to ₹ 100,000

Maximum annual interest rate (APR): 22%

Handling fee: up to 1% of the loan amount, plus 18% GST

Repayment period: 100 to 730 days

How is the loan calculated

Assuming your loan amount is ₹20,000, the loan term is 180 days, and the APR is 20%, the specific calculation method is as follows

Goods and services tax on handling fee: ₹ 36 (18% of ₹ 200)

Handling fee: ₹ 200 (1% \* 20,000)

GST: ₹ 36 (18% \* 200)

Interest: ₹ 1,972.6 (₹ 20,000 \* 20% \* 180/365)

Loan cost: ₹ 2,208.6=₹ 200+₹ 36+₹ 1,972.6 (handling fee+GST+interest)

Total repayment amount: ₹ 22,208.6=₹ 20,000+₹ 2,208.6 (principal+loan cost)

So your monthly repayment amount is: ₹ 3,701.4=₹ 22,208.6/6

description:
As a platform, Smart Finance is a partner of WINSOME FINANCE PVT LTD. WINSOME FINANCE PVT LTD is an NBFC registered and regulated by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI).

Smart Finance was founded to meet the financial needs of users and solve their financial difficulties. As a partner of NBFC, our services are compliant and safe.

Who can apply
Indian residents
20-55 years old with stable income
Hold Aadhaar card, PAN card and active bank account

Loan features
Amount: ₹3,000 - ₹85,000
Term: Very flexible, 120 days to 365 days
Maximum annual percentage rate (APR): 24%
Processing fee: 1% of loan amount

Here is how the loan is calculated
Suppose your loan amount is ₹30,000, the loan term is 121 days, and the daily interest rate is 0.05%, then the specific fees are calculated as follows
Processing fee: ₹300=₹30,000*1%
Processing fee GST: ₹54=₹300*18%
Interest: ₹1,815=₹30,000*0.05%*121
Total repayment amount: ₹32,169=₹30,000+₹300+₹54+₹1,815

How to use Smart Finance
1. Download and install Smart Finance
2. Register
3. Submit loan application
4. Wait for review

Advantages of Smart Finance
Completely paperless online process
Transparent and clear fees
Absolutely secure information

How to contact us
No matter what questions you have, you are welcome to contact us at any time
Email: info@ninesignetfin.com

#### [What is Smart Finance?](https://www.smartfinanceapp.com/\#collapseOne)

Smart Finance is a platform designed to meet users' financial needs by offering loans in partnership with WINSOME FINANCE PVT LTD, an NBFC registered and regulated by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI). It provides safe, compliant, and reliable financial services.


#### [Who can apply for a loan on Smart Finance?](https://www.smartfinanceapp.com/\#collapseTwo)

To apply for a loan, you must:


- Be an Indian resident.
- Be aged between 20-55 years.
- Have a stable income.
- Possess an Aadhaar card, PAN card, and an active bank account.

description:
Wise Loan: EMI Loan Calc can help you calculate the interest of installment loans and the principal and interest of each repayment.

How to use Wise Loan: EMI Loan Calc?

1 Download and install Wise Loan: EMI Loan Calc from Google Play

2 Enter your mobile number to get OTP login. Tip: Creating an account is only for you to access your historical calculation records, and will not be used for other purposes. Your information is absolutely safe.

3 Enter Loan Amount, Interest Rate, Loan Term, and select Repayment Method to calculate the repayment amount and interest of each installment of the current loan.

4 Click Save to save your calculation record and generate a pie chart. The pie chart can clearly show the proportion of the current loan interest in the principal, which is convenient for you to make financial planning.

If you have any questions or comments, please contact us.

The app empowers users with quick estimates of their monthly payments, loan amounts, interest rates, and loan tenure. It enables a user to take informed financial decisions. The Loan EMI Calculator app is an advanced financial tool that is useful in day-to-day life with all useful features.

Our app is your trusted companion for simplifying all your loan and investment calculations. Whether you're planning to buy a home or a car or just explore financial opportunities, our app is here to make financial planning effortless.

With the help of the EMI Loan Calculator, your one-stop financial toolkit designed to make your life easier, you can quickly calculate loan EMIs, plan your investment with RD, and FD calculators. Easy Emi Calculator offers calculations like EMI, GST for daily use.

Loan Emi Calculator app saves time and reduce the chances of human errors thereby balancing speed and accuracy in financial calculations. It also allows you to do unit conversions easily.

The Simple EMI Loan Calculator is a simple and easy-to-use money tool that can help you work out any type of loan. You can get an idea of your weekly payments, loan amount, interest rate, and loan term with just a few clicks.
